moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

moves.name: Perish Song
moves.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

moves.name: Brine
moves.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.
